verses.name: Zechariah 1:17
verses.text: Cry yet, saying, Thus saith the Lord of hosts; My cities through prosperity shall yet be spread abroad; and the Lord shall yet comfort Zion, and shall yet choose Jerusalem.

verses.name: Zechariah 1:18
verses.text: Then lifted I up mine eyes, and saw, and behold four horns.

verses.name: Zechariah 1:19
verses.text: And I said unto the angel that talked with me, What be these? And he answered me, These are the horns which have scattered Judah, Israel, and Jerusalem.

verses.name: Zechariah 1:20
verses.text: And the Lord shewed me four carpenters.
